title: Simple was to create bootabel USB disk with Windows 7/2008 /PE3 and etc.

forumNotes.author: Vladimir Izmalkov
forumNotes.content:
Hello All.
I read a lot of topics about createting bootable flash drive and in most of them propoused use free software for this. Existed very simple way to create bootabel fash drive without any additional software only standart windows(Vista/7/2008) tools is needed. here is the link to howto [How To Boot And Install Windows 7 From USB Flash Drive](http://maketecheasier.com/boot-and-install-windows-7-from-usb-flash-drive/2009/01/23 "External link")
